channel.title: Need help with this int return

item.title: Need help with this int return
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Elfbow:

Remove 401, from the code.

It’s supposed to give random items, including 401.
If I remove 401 it’s just taking the item that came in place which would be 405 in this case.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this int return
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I have a method where I want to add a random fish.

I made this:

private int fishMix2[] = {353, 407, 405, 401, 341};
	private int highFishMix() {
		return fishMix2[(int)(Math.random()*fishMix2.length)];
	}

so in my code it calls addItem(highFishMix());

But for some reason it keeps giving me seaweed (ID 401) not mather how many times I do the action.

Any idea on what’s wrong and how to fix?

Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with this int return
